text: @RobertJenrick Safeguarding concerns=to remove 4yr old from their home, familiar surroundings, making him travel 260m in a confined space with mother infected with Covid19-is abuse. Equally Mary sought to casually assess Dom's dodgy eyesight-road trip. Mary can drive. Welfare of son secondary.
